Package net.sf.oval

Interface Summary
Check interface for classes that can check/validate if a constraint is satisfied
CheckExclusion interface for classes that can exclude the checking of constraints
IValidator An interface implemented by Validator for easier mocking.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCheck Partial implementation of check classes.
AbstractCheckExclusion Partial implementation of exclusion classes.
ConstraintSet  
ConstraintViolation An instance of this class provides detailed information about a single constraint violation that occurred during validation.
Validator Instances of this class can validate objects based on declared constraints.
